categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Shi-Fara was a female Togruta Jedi Padawan who attended the Jedi academy on Coruscant at the same time as Roan Novachez's attendance there. In her second year of attendance, she became the girlfriend of a fellow student, a Human named Pasha. She was a skilled droid creator.
